lead_paragraph: President Obama surprised his vice president, bestowing on him the Presidential Medal of Freedom and calling Mr. Biden “my brother” in a tearful goodbye at the White House.
snippet: President Obama surprised his vice president, bestowing on him the Presidential Medal of Freedom and calling Mr. Biden “my brother” in a tearful goodbye at the White House....

headline.main: Obama Surprises Joe Biden With Presidential Medal of Freedom
headline.print_headline: Obama Surprises Biden With the Presidential Medal of Freedom
